sentence.Network_en: Tell that to the bullfrog, chicken hawk or turtledove.
sentence.Network_cn: 把这件事告诉牛蛙 、 猎鸡鹰和斑鸠.

sentence.Network_en: Yao reads cigarette inside, just be like turtledove dish tea ( cacodaemon name ).
sentence.Network_cn: 遥看烟里面, 恰似鸠盘茶 ( 恶鬼名 ).

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...特尔。Thirkill的变体；2.[英格兰人姓氏]特特尔。绰号，温柔的人，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“斑鸠”(turtledove)；3.[英格兰人姓氏]特特尔。绰号，残疾人，来源于古法语，含义是“歪扭的”(crooked)。

and he said unto him , Take me an heifer of three a she goat of three a ram of three a turtledove a young pigeon .他说、你为我取一只三年的母牛、一只三年的母山羊、一只三年的公绵羊、一只斑鸠、一只雏鸽。
but you two turtledoves have no choice ., 但是你们俩个小朋友别无选择,
the eighth day he must take two turtledoves or two young pigeons and come before Yahweh at the entrance to the Tent of Meeting , and give to the priest .到第八天，应拿两只斑鸠或两只雏鸽，来到上主面前，在会幕门口，交给司祭。
